choose.when: select department_name from department d, site s where d.site_code = s.site_code and s.site_name = #{searchSite}

mapper.select: select p.payment_code, p.payment_date, pd.payment_des_name from payment p, payment_des pd where p.payment_des_code = pd.payment_des_code and SUBSTR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(p.payment_date,1,6), 'YYYY-MM'),1,5) = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into payment_receipt(payment_receipt_code, payment_receipt_item, payment_receipt_price, employee_code, payment_code, int_user_id, int_date) values(payment_receipt_code_seq.nextval, #{payment_receipt_item}, #{payment_receipt_price}, #{x}, #{y}, #{user}, sysdate)

choose.when: select distinct ew.employee_code, e.employee_name, p.payment_code, pd.payment_des_name from employee e, employee_work ew, payment p, selection_of_payment sp, department d, job_class j, payment_des pd where p.payment_code = sp.payment_code and sp.site_code = d.site_code and d.department_code = ew.department_code and j.job_class_code = ew.job_class_code and ew.employee_code = e.employee_code and p.payment_des_code = pd.payment_des_code and p.payment_code = #{Ppayment_code}

select distinct ew.employee_code, e.employee_name, p.payment_code, pd.payment_des_name from employee e, employee_work ew, payment p, selection_of_payment sp, department d, job_class j, payment_des pd where p.payment_code = sp.payment_code and sp.site_code = d.site_code and d.department_code = ew.department_code and j.job_class_code = ew.job_class_code and ew.employee_code = e.employee_code and p.payment_des_code = pd.payment_des_code and p.payment_code = #{Ppayment_code} and d.department_name = #{searchTYPE}
